page.title: 20Newcastle Shopping Changes
page.content: Newcastle claims to be the major shopping town of North Staffs. Recent developments have not all been welcome. Fine Fare Supermarket.The competition between supermarkets is fierce and the Fine Fare Store was decorated in large orange,white and green stripes.Many letters of protest were written to the press.It was called a giant humbug. The Roebuck Centre preserved a Georgian frontage while building a modern shopping centre behind it.This attempt to preserve the character of the town was welcomed but many of the shops have still to be let. Now a development is planned that will provide a large department store, 30 other shops,multi-storey car park and bus station.A protest meeting filled the Guild Hall.A petition was organised People fear that it will change the town completely.
